sentences.en: ...the company that made a name for itself as an early entrant in the digital video-recorder market.
sentences.cn: …这个以数码录像机市场的早期进入者而享有名气的公司。

sentences.en: " A rare pedigreed entrant in a summer of mules. "
sentences.cn: 在一群夏季影片的骡子里,这是一匹罕见的纯种马.

sentences.en: A well publicized entrant is the pocket computer.
sentences.cn: 广泛宣传的新型竞争产品是掌上电脑.

sentences.en: Additional, new entrant may borrowed its commercial pattern.
sentences.cn: 此外, 新进入者可能会剽窃它的商业模式.

sentences.en: All items entered for the competition must be the entrant's own work.
sentences.cn: 所有参赛作品必须是参赛者本人的作品。

sentences.en: Contains a material that has the potential for engulfing an entrant.
sentences.cn: 包含有可能困住进入人员的物质.

sentences.en: Each entrant may submit only one entry form.
sentences.cn: 每位参加者只可递交一份参加表格.

sentences.en: Each entrant should not submit more than 3 pieces of work.
sentences.cn: 每名参赛学生最多只可递交作品三件.

sentences.en: HOW is not liable for any copyright infringement on the part of the entrant.
sentences.cn: 对于产品的任何侵权行为,HOW将不负责.

sentences.en: How to forecast sales of an early entrant to market?
sentences.cn: 如何预测市场早期进入者的销售 呢 ?

sentences.en: In either case the entrant would be at a cost disadvantage.
sentences.cn: 不管是何种情况,加入的厂商都处于成本劣势.

sentences.en: Major Jack joined the army as a boy entrant and worked his way up.
sentences.cn: 杰克少校是少年入伍,后来逐步升上去的.

sentences.en: One new entrant was astounded by this procedure.
sentences.cn: 新加入的合营者会被这些程序给弄糊涂了.

sentences.en: Please mark clearly the Entrant Name and Entry Title on each submission.
sentences.cn: 请于作品上贴上标签,列明参赛编号,参赛者名称及作品名称.

sentences.en: The Entrant agrees and undertakes to accept and be responsible for all such liability arising therefrom.
sentences.cn: 参赛者同意及承诺会接受及为所有该等由此而起的责任负责.

sentences.en: The winning entrant received tickets to the theatre.
sentences.cn: 获胜者得到了剧院的入场券.

words.tran_cn: 使人入神的；令人欣喜的
进入者；新会员；参加竞赛者；新工作者

trans.tran_cn: 参加者，新加入的，参加竞赛者，新生，新工作者
trans.tran_en: someone who takes part in a competition
